roasts.name: El Salvador Finca Calera
roasts.tasting_notes: Delightful. Candy sweet, chocolate backbone, could not ask for a better cup of pour over.

roasts.name: Papua New Guinea Kindeng
roasts.tasting_notes: Subtle, subdued and laid back charmer. Ripe cherries on a dark coffee (but not chocolatey) background. Took 10 days off roast to really shine.

roasts.name: Espresso Blend
roasts.tasting_notes: Chocolate finish, restrained 3rd wave espresso flavor, thick body, low acidity, gentle sweetness. Easy to pull a good shot with various parameters. Brew hotter for some tart cherries. Difficult to make sour. Excellent unique balance!
